title: is ask riot unavailable in oce?
body: i went to the ask riot page and it said that this page is unavailable in your region at first i ignored it and i also ignored i had to click the "log in to ask riot button" even though i was already logged in, but when i DID click it it logged me OUT of my account. i found this quite odd because a moderator  linked me to the ask riot page so i thought that i would be able to use it. is ask riot only for na or is this just me?

replies.body:
I just tried to log in and got signed out as well. Thanks for bringing this to my attention. I've reported it to the right team and we'll start looking into it.

I don't know when it may be working properly again, but I recommend periodically checking back on the page to see if it's working.
